user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and I need some help. Can you find me a list of logistics companies that can deliver party supplies to my location? Additionally, I want to browse through smart wristbands on Gearbest to find a suitable gift for my friend. Please provide me with the product details of a smart wristband and the available shipping options to my country.

TaskList.description: Find a list of logistics companies that deliver party supplies to the user's location.
Browse through available smart wristbands on Gearbest to find suitable gifts.
Retrieve product details for the selected smart wristband, including specifications and pricing.
Check available shipping options for the selected smart wristband to the user's country.
